bg0.usages: Default Background, Line Numbers Background, Signs Background, Status Line Background (inactive), Tab Line Label (active)

bg1.usages: Cursor Line Background, Color Columns, Closed Folds Background, Status Line Background (active), Tab Line Background

bg2.usages: Popup Menu Background, Floating Window Background, Window Toolbar Background

bg3.usages: List Chars, Special Keys, Tab Line Label Background (inactive)

bg_red.usages: Diff Deleted Line Background, Error Highlights

bg_green.usages: Diff Added Line Background, Hint Highlights

bg_blue.usages: Diff Changed Line Background, Info Highlights

fg.usages: Default Foreground, Signs, [Treesitter: Constants, Variables, Function Parameters, Properties, Symbol Identifiers]

red.usages: Conditional Keywords, Loop Keywords, Exception Keywords, Inclusion Keywords, Uncategorised Keywords, Diff Deleted Signs, Error Messages, Error Signs

orange.usages: Operator Keywords, Operators, Labels, Storage Classes, Composite Types, Enumerated Types, Tags, Title, Debugging Statements

yellow.usages: Types, Special Characters, Warning Messages, Warning Signs, [Treesitter: Modules, Namespaces]

green.usages: Function Names, Method Names, Strings, Characters, Hint Messages, Hint Signs, Search Highlights, [Treesitter: Constructors, Function Calls, Built-In Functions, Macro Functions, String Escapes, Regex Literals, Tag Delimiters, Non-Structured Text]

blue.usages: Identifiers, Uncategorised Special Symbols, Diff Changed Text Background, Info Messages, Info Signs, [Treesitter: Fields, Special Punctuation, Math Environments]

purple.usages: Booleans, Numbers, Preprocessors, [Treesitter: Built-In Constants, Built-In Variables, Macro-Defined Constants, Attributes/Annotations]

grey0.usages: Line Numbers, Fold Columns, Concealed Text, Foreground UI Elements

grey1.usages: Comments, Punctuation Delimiters, Closed Folds, Ignored/Disabled, UI Borders, Status Line Text

grey2.usages: Cursor Line Number, Tab Line Label (inactive)

statusline1.usages: Menu Selection Background, Tab Line Label Background (active), Status Line Mode Indicator
